title: Journey From Sketch To Screen: talks and events
other_title: DreamWorks Animation: The Exhibition. The Interviews
abstract: Go behind the scenes with the creative team for 'DreamWorks Animation: The Exhibition'.
description: From the award-winning studio that brought you the animated classics 'Shrek', 'Madagascar' and 'Kung Fu Panda' comes the biggest exhibition in ACMI's history - a world-first behind the scenes celebration of 20 years of DreamWorks Animation. This program of interviews and live events were created as part of the exhibition.  The exhibition features over 400 items including rare and never-before-seen concept drawings, models and original artworks, interviews and interactive displays from DreamWorks much-loved and favourite animated classics.  The exhibition was developed by the Australian Centre for the Moving Image (ACMI) and DreamWorks Animation and shown as part of the Melbourne Winter Masterpieces. 'DreamWorks Animation: The Exhibition' 10 April - 5 October 2014. Proudly supported by the United States Consulate General, Melbourne.
